## Store.bindingAsRx() method

**Signature:**

```typescript
bindingAsRx<TKey extends keyof this>(key: TKey): RXObservable<this[TKey]>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Store property key.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

RXObservable&lt;this\[TKey\]&gt;

An rxjs Observable of that key's value.

## Example


```ts
const ready$ = this.store.bindingAsRx('ready').subscribe(value => {...});
```
